lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 31 -- Attorney General Francis Biddle this week went to Atlanta and presented "Award of Merit" certificates to several score of the prisoners at the Federal penitentiary there for outstanding work in production of war materials.
abstract: Atlanta prisoners get Merit Awards for wartime output; Fed Prison Bur rept on output throughout U S
snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 31 -- Attorney General Francis Biddle this week went to Atlanta and presented "Award of Merit" certificates to several score of the prisoners at the Federal penitentiary there for outstanding work in production of war materials....

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES
